title: Convert ISO Date
description: In this lab, you will learn how to convert a date string in ISO-8601 format to a `datetime.datetime` object using the `datetime.fromisoformat()` function in Python.

meta.title: Convert ISO Date in Python
meta.description: Learn how to convert a date from ISO-8601 format to a datetime.datetime object in Python.
meta.keywords: python, iso date, datetime, date conversion

verify.name: Verify Python Script Execution from ISO Date
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
